meta.topic: A cat paw gently pressing colorful, clear slime with bubbles
meta.notes: Generated based on hotspot keywords: cat, ASMR, slime. Focus on soothing and realistic visuals.

veo_params.negative_prompt: cartoon, drawing, low quality, overexposure, blurry

prompt.concept: A close-up video of a cat's paw gently pressing into colorful, clear slime with bubbles, creating a calming ASMR effect.

shots.composition: centered on the paw and slime

actions: very slow zoom-in throughout the shot
prompt.lighting: dim, warm, natural light like a sunset to enhance colors and details
prompt.audio: gentle ASMR sounds of squishing and bubbles

beats.description: Paw approaches and starts pressing into slime
Paw fully presses, bubbles form and move
